Unlocking the Future Value of Emerging Consumers

  • Lenders/Financial Institutions

    Make more-informed lending decisions, attract new audiences, develop new products.

  • Academic Institutions

    Improve graduation rates, inform admission decisions, improve financial aid operations.

  • Residential Real Estate

    Gain greater confidence in tenant qualification, develop reliable criteria for application evaluation.

  • Marketing

    Start building long-term consumer value early, improve targeting, conversion, loyalty rates.

  • Insurance

    Increase effectiveness of underwriting decisions, expand policy opportunities, develop new products.

  • Employment

    Enhance recruiting and employment processes, from screening to selection to validation.

Case Studies

  • INvestED was searching for means to increase its loan portfolio. Their traditional, restrictive lending practices, focused on lending to students with credit worthy co-signers, limited their opportunities for growth.

    Their objective: expand lending to a broader universe of students – without increasing portfolio risk.

  • Meritize lends to students pursuing skills-based training, expanding funding options by using prior academic achievements in their credit evaluation.

    The company was struggling to quickly assess an applicant’s academic history, and predict the likelihood of loan repayment. They needed a solution that looked beyond traditional credit scores.
